SEARCH
Package com.example.controller

Klasse ObjectiveController

java.lang.Object
com.example.controller.ObjectiveController
@RestController @RequestMapping({"/objective","/company/{companyId}/okrset/{okrId}/objective","/company/{companyId}/businessunit/{buId}/okrset/{okrId}/objective"}) public class ObjectiveController extends Object
This class represents the controller for managing Objective entities.

  • Methodendetails

    • getObjective

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Objective> getObjective(@PathVariable("companyId") @NonNull Optional<UUID> companyId, @PathVariable("buId") Optional<UUID> buId, @PathVariable("okrId") @NonNull Optional<UUID> okrId)
      Retrieves all objectives for a given company, (business unit), and OKRSet.
      Parameter:
      companyId - the ID of the company
      buId - the ID of the business unit
      okrId - the ID of the OKRSet
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity containing the set of objectives if found, or a not found response if not

    • getObjectiveById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Objective> getObjectiveById(@PathVariable("id") @NonNull UUID id)
      Retrieves an objective by its ID.
      Parameter:
      id - the ID of the objective to retrieve
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity containing the objective if found, or a not found response if not

    • createObjective

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Objective> createObjective(@RequestBody @NonNull Objective objective, @PathVariable("companyId") @NonNull Optional<UUID> companyId, @PathVariable("buId") Optional<UUID> buId, @PathVariable("okrId") @NonNull Optional<UUID> okrId)
      Creates a new objective for a given company, (business unit), and OKRSet.
      Parameter:
      objective - the objective to create
      companyId - the ID of the company
      buId - the ID of the business unit
      okrId - the ID of the OKRSet
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity containing the created objective if successful, or a conflict response if the objective already exists

    • updateObjective

      @PutMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Objective> updateObjective(@RequestBody @NonNull Objective objective, @PathVariable("companyId") @NonNull Optional<UUID> companyId, @PathVariable("buId") Optional<UUID> buId, @PathVariable("okrId") @NonNull Optional<UUID> okrId)
      Updates an existing objective for a given company, (business unit),and OKRSet.
      Parameter:
      objective - the updated objective
      companyId - the ID of the company
      buId - the ID of the business unit
      okrId - the ID of the OKRSet
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated objective if successful, or a not found response if the objective does not exist

    • deleteObjective

      @DeleteMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Objective> deleteObjective(@PathVariable("companyId") @NonNull Optional<UUID> companyId, @PathVariable("buId") Optional<UUID> buId, @PathVariable("okrId") @NonNull Optional<UUID> okrId)
      Deletes an existing objective for a given company, (business unit), and OKRSet.
      Parameter:
      companyId - the ID of the company
      buId - the ID of the business unit
      okrId - the ID of the OKRSet
      Gibt zurück:
      ResponseEntity containing the deleted objective if successful, or a not found response if the objective does not exist
